TopicTitle: I keep having this problem with the endurance mod for 1.8 with the electric charge of the Ranger, Lander, and Viper.

Articles.Content: So the engines of all these craft require electric charge. But whenever I turn the electric charge on, they run out of electric charge in seconds. I make sure to turn on the fuel cells, but that doesn't help. Is this a glitch or am I doing something wrong?

The reactors are broken and don’t generate power. I created a hacky patch to add RTG-style always on generators to those parts to run the engines to get around it, my attempts to fix the problem properly never got anywhere.
